name: AHU Controller Performance
description: This report evaluates air handling unit (AHU) cooling valve, heating valve, and outside air damper commands based on total actuator movement and oscillations over time.

equipmentSpecs.tupleConstraintErrorMessage: Expected either a ClgCmd (cmd,cooling) point, a HtgCmd (cmd,heating) point, or an OaDmprCmd (air,cmd,damper,outside) point, but found none

pointSpecs.name: ClgCmd
pointSpecs.errorMessage: Expected zero or one ClgCmd (cmd,cooling) point with data type of Numeric

pointSpecs.name: DaFanSts
pointSpecs.errorMessage: Expected zero or one DaFanSts (air,discharge,fan,run,sensor) point

pointSpecs.name: HtgCmd
pointSpecs.errorMessage: Expected zero or one HtgCmd (cmd,heating) point with data type of Numeric

pointSpecs.name: OaDmprCmd
pointSpecs.errorMessage: Expected zero or one OaDmprCmd (air,cmd,damper,outside) point

name: AHU Economizer Performance
description: This report evaluates Air Handling Unit (AHU) economizer operation (free cooling) and outside airflow, and provides a score based on the effectiveness of both. Fault conditions contributing to the score are: 1) weather conditions permit free cooling, but is not being fully utilized and 2) excessive outside air is entering the building resulting in additional heating or cooling. A relative cost is calculated to project the impact of these conditions.

equipmentSpecs.tupleConstraintExpression: (((OaHumidity && OaTemp) || (OffPremOaTemp && OffPremOaHumidity)) && ((DaFlow && OaFlow) || (MaTemp && RaTemp) || OaDmprCmd) && ((OaFlowMinSp && DaFlow) || OaDmprMinPosSp) && (ColdDeckTempSp || ColdDeckTemp || DaTempSp || DaTemp))
equipmentSpecs.tupleConstraintErrorMessage: Point tuple constraint: (((OaHumidity && OaTemp) || (OffPremOaTemp && OffPremOaHumidity)) && ((DaFlow && OaFlow) || (MaTemp && RaTemp) || OaDmprCmd) && ((OaFlowMinSp && DaFlow) || OaDmprMinPosSp) && (ColdDeckTempSp || ColdDeckTemp || DaTempSp || DaTemp))

name: High Demand Zones
description: This report identifies the most demanding VAV boxes based on the demand for cooling and airflow within the zone. The 25 most demanding VAV boxes are presented, along with potential root causes. ASHRAE Energy Standard 90.1 - 2016 requires the tracking and identification of high demand zones that will likely drive reset control strategies.

name: RTU DX Staging - Short Cycling
description:
According to Copeland from Emerson Climate Technologies, to reduce the stress on the compressor running gear, a balanced pressure shutdown and subsequent start-up is suggested. This is obtained by equalizing the pressures for a brief period before shutdown and at start-up.
		•   The ideal suggested compressor cycle rate for reciprocating compressors is a maximum of 12 cycles per hour.
		•   This includes a recommended off time between cycles of 10 seconds minimum.
		•   The recommended minimum run time from startup to shutdown is 5 minutes.

pointSpecs.name: ClgCmd
pointSpecs.errorMessage: Expected one ClgCmd (cmd,cooling) point
